title: Important features of music streaming services in the U.S. 2018
summary: The Important features Response in the streaming services was Response The_ability_to_listen_on_multiple_divices , who made 81 respondents .
The most features Response was Good_algorithms_to_find_new_music , with just 46 respondents .

In second place was Response Low_price_point with 80 respondents ; third place went to Response The_variety_of_music_available with 81 respondents ; fourth place went to Response Artist_exclusives with 46 respondents and fifth place went to Response Clean_user_interface , who was 66 respondents .

data.Response: The ability to listen on multiple divices
Good algorithms to find new music
The ability to combine your music library with your streaming service library
The ability to stream on smart home devices

gold: This statistic presents data on the most important features of music streaming services among adults in the United States as of March 2018 . During a survey , 81 percent of respondents stated that the variety of music available was the most important feature of music streaming services .
